title: How is it possible that a movie cast long ago showed almost exactly the same scenario of the world facing today with covid 19? - Quora

response.answer_text: Because despite what Donald Trump says, the idea of a Novel Coronavirus is not new and did not take everyone by surprise. Scientists and epidemiologists have been concerned about this for decades. Even Presidents George W. Bush and Barack Obama were concerned enough to begin preparing for an occurence. It's no shock that Hollywood would pick up on the idea and create a film based on the information that was readily available. What's more shocking is that a US President would completely disregard the briefings from his own staff and act as though he knew nothing and was never warned about the possibility of a pandemic until it was already upon us.
You mean Dracula with Bela Lugosi?  Certainly not a coincidence. All the more because Dwight Frye is more current than ever as Renfield.
